fullText: Bobby Cannavale gives a powerhouse performance as Charlie Castle, a movie star trapped between his conscience and his career in this revival of Clifford Odets' 1949 drama.
dtliExcerpt: Bobby Cannavale gives a powerhouse performance as Charlie Castle, a movie star trapped between his conscience and his career in this revival of Clifford Odets' 1949 drama.
bwwExcerpt: The play moves along at a reasonably fast clip, and Odets paints a fascinating portrait of Hollywood as a machine that destroys people, marriages and ideals. Too bad the production only gives us a partial view, a CinemaScope movie seen on a computer screen.
showScoreExcerpt: Bobby Cannavale gives a powerhouse performance as Charlie Castle, a movie star trapped between his conscience and his career in this revival of Clifford Odets' 1949 drama.
